header.title: Advanced BBCode Box 3 with ACP ( aka ABBC3 )
header.author-notes:
You will have to make this change to ALL themes you have installed, based off Prosilver. I use "Prosilver" as an example. ------------------------------------------------------------------- IMPORTANT !
Before made any changes, makes sure your template is stored into "filesystem" ACP -> STYLES -> STYLE COMPONENTS -> Templates : prosilver -> Details
If you do not want to change from "Database" to "Filesystem", you must do next changes within your ACP : ACP -> STYLES -> STYLE COMPONENTS -> Templates : prosilver -> Edit
-------------------------------------------------------------------

action-group.diy-instructions:
IMPORTANT !
##################################################################### Log on to Administration Control Panel
##################################################################### A) Purge the templates :
A.1) Navigate to "Styles" Tab. A.2) Under "Style components " click on "Templates". A.3) Under "Actions" click on "Refresh". A.4) in the next screen, click on "Yes" ( Repeat last 2 steps to each instaled style, based off Prosilver ). A.5) Under "Style components " click on "Themes". A.6) Under "Actions" click on "Refresh". A.7) in the next screen, click on "Yes" ( Repeat last 2 steps to each instaled style, based off Prosilver ).
